Wow. You reply to this awfully fast, but not to all the hurt and anger former shoppers over caving in over DEI. My store in Spring Valley, NY, often had empty shelves, especially in groceries, but I went there anyway because I loved your company and the community support votes in your app. And when the "Bingo" store opened in the same plaza and I thought you were losing business I made it my point to shop there. No more. My daughter has special needs so this is personal for me.
